name: Karen Bonnett-Natraj
what_you_do: Scitechseries organizes international conferences focused on entrepreneurship, bringing together business leaders, entrepreneurs, and academics to discuss innovative ideas and strategies.
who_you_serve: The audience includes business tycoons, women entrepreneurs, youth, academic entrepreneurs, scholars, students, and corporate entities from around the globe.
current_projects: 5th International Conference on Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2026
bio: Successful completion of multiple international conferences with notable speakers and a diverse audience.
business_focus: Scitechseries organizes international conferences focused on entrepreneurship, bringing together business leaders, entrepreneurs, and academics to discuss innovative ideas and strategies.
